text: khuda hee (qaadir tavaana) hai jo havaon ko bhejata hai to vah baadalon ko udae udae phiratee hain phir vahee khuda baadal ko jis tarah chaahata hai aasamaan mein phaila deta hai aur (kabhee) usako tukade (tukade) kar deta hai phir tum dekhate ho ki boondiyaan usake daramiyaan se nikal padatee hain phir jab khuda unhen apane bandon mein se jis par chahata hai barasa deta hai to vah log khushiyaan maaaanane lagate hain
